gremlins

Class RespawnGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.RespawnGenerator

  • public class RespawnGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    RespawnGenerator class: a helper class that uses the Random library to generate a set of random coordinates That are at least a 10 block radius away from a specified entity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RespawnGenerator(Entity e)
      Constructor for RandomGenerator Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] respawnXBlocks(App app)
      respawnXBlocks (10 blocks) is a method that generates coordinates at least 10 blocks away from the entity at the epicentre.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RespawnGenerator

        public RespawnGenerator(Entity e)
        Constructor for RandomGenerator Object
        Parameters:
        e - An entity in the game that the objects will be spawned 10 blocks away from

    • Method Detail

      • respawnXBlocks

        public int[] respawnXBlocks(App app)
        respawnXBlocks (10 blocks) is a method that generates coordinates at least 10 blocks away from the entity at the epicentre.
        Parameters:
        app - the App class, which contains the map of blocks that must be checked.
        Returns:
        An integer array that corresponds to {x coordinate, y coordinate}
